name: VIR-129.05 Verify that the content admin can add a quick ship component on the template page

userStory.narrative:
As a content admin I would like the Home page to be configured as below:
1st : Rotating Theme / promotional message / installation shot
2nd left: Product Recommendation
2nd right: Quick Ship
3rd: Popular category / product images

title: VIR-129.05 Verify that the content admin can add a quick ship component on the template page
